email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] [PHP-BUG] Bug #71328 [NEW]: wrong link to php-gtk docs
email.body:
From: marcosptf at yahoo dot com dot br Operating system: irrelevant PHP version: Irrelevant Package: PHP-GTK related Bug Type: Bug Bug description:wrong link to php-gtk docs
Description: ------------ in php online docs, exist a link to php-gtk docs online, but this link is wrong, and the user get a 404 error.
this endpoint need to be update like the images below:
1.place where in php.net the link to php-gtk is wrong https://www.flickr.com/photos/72707809@N02/23660587794/in/dateposted-public/
2.if the user click it, will get a 404 error from them https://www.flickr.com/photos/72707809@N02/23993207460/in/dateposted-public/
3.the right endpoint to php-gtk online docs https://www.flickr.com/photos/72707809@N02/24206283931/in/dateposted-public/
thanks :-)
-- Edit bug report at https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=71328&edit=1 -- Try a snapshot (PHP 5.4): https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=trysnapshot54 Try a snapshot (PHP 5.5): https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=trysnapshot55 Try a snapshot (trunk): https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=trysnapshottrunk Fixed in SVN: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=fixed Fixed in release: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=alreadyfixed Need backtrace: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=needtrace Need Reproduce Script: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=needscript Try newer version: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=oldversion Not developer issue: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=support Expected behavior: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=notwrong Not enough info: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=notenoughinfo Submitted twice: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=submittedtwice register_globals: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=globals PHP 4 support discontinued: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=php4 Daylight Savings: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=dst IIS Stability: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=isapi Install GNU Sed: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=gnused Floating point limitations: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=float No Zend Extensions: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=nozend MySQL Configuration Error: https://bugs.php.net/fix.php?id=71328&r=mysqlcfg

On Mon, Oct 3, 2016 at 2:43 PM, Franck Gros-dubois < franckgrosdubois@gmail.com> wrote:
> Hi, > > I am french, so excuse my poor english. > I wanted to know if PHP GTK could be used to create phone apps. > Thanks for the answer, > > Best regards > Franck G. >

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] My Final Take (After two years)
email.body:
[Attachment #2 (text/plain)]
While I find the idea of PHP-GTK interesting, I don't see it as an actual language \ but instead PHP with GTK+'s C API bolted on and called using normal PHP syntax. What \ I would love to see is a form of PHP for GTK that takes normal PHP syntax and puts it \ into Gtk+ calls in the background, without having to be up-front with those calls or \ have knowledge of Gtk. I don't know where you're at in the process, but Gtk 4.0 is \ said to be coming soon. Some of you may tell me a PHP form factor like that's never \ gonna happen, but boy would that be awesome...
Cheers! --MGage Morgan, co-founder and CEO of Christoffen Corporation. Find us online at \ https://christoffen.com

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Bug #52274 [Asn->Ana]: Patch for building php-gtk with scintilla on Ubuntu
email.body:
Edit report at https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=52274&edit=1
ID: 52274 Updated by: buhlerax@php.net Reported by: thomas dot sahlin at invented dot se Summary: Patch for building php-gtk with scintilla on Ubuntu -Status: Assigned +Status: Analyzed Type: Bug Package: PHP-GTK related Operating System: Ubuntu 10.04 PHP Version: 5.3.2 Assigned To: buhlerax Block user comment: N Private report: N
New Comment:
The 2.0.1 version of php-gtk will no longer fixes. We will work on version 3 of the php-gtk with gtk 3.
Previous Comments: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [2010-07-07 13:05:03] thomas dot sahlin at invented dot se
Description: ------------ I've created a patch which makes it possible to build php-gtk with scintilla on \ Ubuntu/Linux. The patch will break things on other platforms, so someone with better \ knowledge of configure/make will have to figure out a proper fix.
Description of changes:
ext/scintilla/config.m4 Added missing source files for scintilla
ext/scintilla/libscintilla/include/Platform.h Set #define PLAT_GTK 1 - this is not done automatically for some reason.
ext/scintilla/libscintilla/src/ExternalLexer.h Removed EXT_LEXER_DECL definition from typedefs.
ext/scintilla/sci_generator.php Fixed to be compatible with the new LineOutput class. Also removed deprecated \ functions and warnings.
There is also some dependency problem in the makefile, so one has to manually make \ gen_scintilla.c:
make ext/scintilla/gen_scintilla.c make
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Edit this bug report at https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=52274&edit=1
-- PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Bug #53813 [Asn->Ana]: GdkEvent keyval field not writable
email.body:
Edit report at https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=53813&edit=1
ID: 53813 Updated by: buhlerax@php.net Reported by: ptlis at ptlis dot net Summary: GdkEvent keyval field not writable -Status: Assigned +Status: Analyzed Type: Bug Package: PHP-GTK related Operating System: Linux 32bit PHP Version: 5.3.5 Assigned To: buhlerax Block user comment: N Private report: N
New Comment:
The 2.0.1 version of php-gtk will no longer fixes. We will work on version 3 of the php-gtk with gtk 3.
Previous Comments: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [2011-01-25 17:08:34] markskilbeck@php.net
There's no write_property handler for the GdkEvent stuff. It also seems to be missing for other objects. I'll work on a patch today for GdkEvent.
------------------------------------------------------------------------ [2011-01-22 14:10:11] ptlis at ptlis dot net
Description: ------------ If you create a GdkEvent with the GdkEventType Gdk::KEY_PRESS and try to assign a \ value to the keyval field the keyval field does not change.
Test script: --------------- $event = new GdkEvent(Gdk::KEY_PRESS); $event->keyval = Gdk::KEY_Return; var_dump($event);
Expected result: ---------------- object(GdkEvent)#4466 (9) { ["keyval"]=> int(65293) ["time"]=> int(0) ["state"]=> int(0) ["string"]=> string(0) "" ["hardware_keycode"]=> int(0) ["group"]=> int(0) ["type"]=> int(8) ["window"]=> NULL ["send_event"]=> bool(false) }
Actual result: -------------- object(GdkEvent)#4466 (9) { ["keyval"]=> int(0) ["time"]=> int(0) ["state"]=> int(0) ["string"]=> string(0) "" ["hardware_keycode"]=> int(0) ["group"]=> int(0) ["type"]=> int(8) ["window"]=> NULL ["send_event"]=> bool(false) }
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Edit this bug report at https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=53813&edit=1
-- PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Bug #63420 [Asn->Ana]: PHP-GTK crashes when loading glade extension
email.body:
Edit report at https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=63420&edit=1
ID: 63420 Updated by: buhlerax@php.net Reported by: nikodu01 at live dot fr Summary: PHP-GTK crashes when loading glade extension -Status: Assigned +Status: Analyzed Type: Bug Package: PHP-GTK related Operating System: Ubuntu 11.10 PHP Version: Irrelevant Assigned To: buhlerax Block user comment: N Private report: N
New Comment:
The 2.0.1 version of php-gtk will no longer fixes. We will work on version 3 of the php-gtk with gtk 3.
Previous Comments: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ [2012-11-05 14:11:16] auroraeosrose@php.net
So this is actually a bug with the php-gtk glade extension and loading
I'll take a look but it's not a high priority since libglade is deprecated - I would \ suggest you try migrating any glade code to gtkbuilder on any existing projects
------------------------------------------------------------------------ [2012-11-03 09:18:05] nikodu01 at live dot fr
1/ I have put cairo.so and php_gtk2.so in the ini file and always crash 2/ I don't specify to use liglade i just compile php-gtk with this : ./buildconf && ./configure --prefix=/usr && make 3/ Yes i load it before
I made different try and compiling php-gtk with ./configure --prefix=/usr -- without-libglade don't crash anymore
my libglade version is 2.6.4
------------------------------------------------------------------------ [2012-11-02 14:35:29] auroraeosrose@php.net
Not enough information was provided for us to be able to handle this bug. Please re-read the instructions at http://bugs.php.net/how-to-report.php
If you can provide more information, feel free to add it to this bug and change the status back to "Open".
Thank you for your interest in PHP.
1. Does this also segfault when you load it via an ini file? 2. This appears to be having issues when attempting to load the glade php-gtk \ extension, is that in an ini file? Or did you compile it statically into php-gtk? 3. \ the PECL cairo extension IS a required dependency of php-gtk - did you load that \ before you attempted to load php-gtk? PHP should be angry if you don't do that \ instead of segfaulting - but just checking to see what exactly is making this blow up
------------------------------------------------------------------------ [2012-11-02 12:48:31] nikodu01 at live dot fr
Description: ------------ Version : PHP 5.4.8 & PHP-GTK Git
When loading the extension we got a sigsev
Test script: --------------- dl( 'php_gtk2.so' );
Expected result: ---------------- Load library
Actual result: -------------- Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. 0x000000000080c5dd in zend_initialize_class_data (ce=0x1b0fcc0, nullify_handlers=0 '\000', tsrm_ls=0x1b) at '\000', tsrm_ls=0x1b) at /src/build/php- 5.4.8/Zend/zend_compile.c:6748 #1 0x00000000008342cc in do_register_internal_class (orig_class_entry=0x7fffffffa5d0, ce_flags=0, tsrm_ls=0x1b) at /src/build/php- 5.4.8/Zend/zend_API.c:2401 #2 0x00000000008345f0 in zend_register_internal_class (orig_class_entry=0x7fffffffa5d0, tsrm_ls=0x1b) at /src/build/php- 5.4.8/Zend/zend_API.c:2467 #3 email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Questions about phone apps
email.body:
Hi,
I am french, so excuse my poor english. I wanted to know if PHP GTK could be used to create phone apps. Thanks for the answer,
Best regards Franck G.

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Php-Gtk Distribution
email.body:
Hello,
I have done my first program using Php-Gtk and was amazing, but I was wondering, exists a way to distribute my project in a file .exe? I need to protect my code and execute in a machine who don't have php-gtk installed, so I need to compile and generate a exe of my project, it's possible?
Thanks!
-- Atenciosamente
*Johann Lucas Scherer* Desenvolvimento NetForce +55 47 3037-4953 desenvolvedor1@netforce.com.br <atendimento@netforce.com.br> www.netforce.com.br

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Question on GTK Future
email.body:
Hi, I stumbled upon your project and am very interested in trying it out. My dilemma is I have converted all to 5.6 and noticed latest was for 5.5. Just curious on my end if there are any potentials on bridging forward or any interest on getting picked up? What I have is a heavy implemented MS Office/php setup and this is perfect for what I want to see what I can do. I would hate to downgrade but since I am internal only it is merely (well you know). Before doing so I want to know if I should invest my time. Thanks in advance. Happy holidays.
-- PHP-GTK Development Mailing List (http://gtk.php.net/) To unsubscribe, visit: http://www.php.net/unsub.php

email.subject: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Pergunta sobre o GTk
email.body:
Ol=C3=A1, bom dia. Trabalho com PHP faz algum tempo, mas nunca tive a necessidade que estou vivenciando agora.
Criar uma aplica=C3=A7=C3=A3o gr=C3=A1fica para Windows.
Gostaria de perguntar como fa=C3=A7o para comunicar com os perif=C3=A9ricos do computador, por exemplo, acessar diretamente a impressora e mandar imprimir um texto, etc...
Obrigado.

email.subject: Re: [PHP-GTK-DEV] Pergunta sobre o GTk
email.body:
Se voce quer o jeito facil, pode criar um arquivo, txt, html, ou at=C3=A9 p= df, e abrir pra visualizar, assim o usuario imprimi manualmente
Se voc=C3=AA quer o jeito certo, mas mais complexo, pode usar as fun=C3=A7= =C3=B5es de printer
http://php.net/manual/fa/ref.printer.php
Abra=C3=A7os
- - - Bruno Pitteli Gon=C3=A7alves bruno@pitteli.com.br
- - - ScornInPC - http://bruno.pitteli.com.br/ <http://blog.scorninpc.com/> Browse Happy - http://browsehappy.com/
2016-11-26 5:02 GMT-02:00 Erc=C3=ADlio Barbosa <ercilio1@gmail.com>:
> Ol=C3=A1, bom dia. > Trabalho com PHP faz algum tempo, > mas nunca tive a necessidade que estou vivenciando agora. > > Criar uma aplica=C3=A7=C3=A3o gr=C3=A1fica para Windows. > > Gostaria de perguntar como fa=C3=A7o para comunicar com > os perif=C3=A9ricos do computador, por exemplo, > acessar diretamente a impressora e mandar imprimir um texto, etc... > > Obrigado. >
